# Swimming, Improved
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 7th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 10,000 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

As a *[[Swimming|ring of swimming]]*, except it grants a +10 competence bonus on its wearer’s [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], creator must have 10 ranks in the [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] skill

**Cost** 5,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
